name: Antebellum
description:
Hello and welcome! 

Antebellum is a 3D Action-Adventure game in first person. It was developed in 7 months by a team of 5 people. It has recently reached a Golden stage, but consider this is a vertical slice for a much bigger project. Enjoy!

Producer and Programmer: Gianluca Circasso

QA tester and Level Designer: Ashley Cousen

Lead Programmer: Hassan Hamid

Animator and 3D Artist: Daniel Hughes

Creative  Leader and Programmer: Giacomo Mazza, me.
